column1: Uchi////If this is your first visit
column2: I would suggest asking for the original vegetarian brussel sprouts [brussel sprouts
column6: we didn't see them on the menu
column7: but when we asked afterwards if they would be back our server said that you can request them. So do yourself a favor and ask for them
column8: they are D E L I S H! For dessert try the peanut butter semifreddo apple-miso sorbet. It is owner and chef Tyson Cole's version of PB&J according to their cookbook which has been beautifully done.
